oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1937: Santa Claus will visit the poor. Thanks to Works Progress Administration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1937 flood; WPA; floods; Mississippi River; Santa Claus; Christmas; holidays; toys;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Men are shown building toys so that Santa Claus can still gift the children of Memphis despite the circumstances.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Caradine, Kathleen West
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor:
Photos by Beardsley, Hugh L.
Typing by Derryberry, Eugenia
